caption: The image depicts a scene at the entrance of "Hope Cemetery" as indicated on the hanging signboard. The sign is mounted on two wooden posts and spans across the top of a metal mesh gate, which is part of a longer wire fence surrounding the area. This cemetery's entrance is adorned with lush greenery, including tall, mature trees visible in the background and smaller shrubs and plants in the foreground. The neatly-manicured grass field inside the cemetery contains several visible gravestones, ranging in size and shape, indicating a variety of burial markers customary in Western cemetery practices. The sky above is clear and blue, suggesting a sunny and calm day. Overall, the setting conveys a serene and peaceful cemetery environment.
title: On a rural road
